title: Ticket #7543: Fix SSL link error on macOS 10.15
description:
In macOS 10.15, programs are no longer allowed to link against /usr/lib/libcrypto.dylib and /usr/lib/libssl.dylib. They must link against a specific version, like /usr/lib/libcrypt.35.dylib. We need to change our build scripts accordingly. For now, we'll link against version 35 for all versions of macOS. As a subsequent step, we should try linking against a newer version where available.

The linker gives the following error: 

ld: cannot link directly with dylib/framework, your binary is not an allowed client of /usr/lib/libcrypto.dylib for architecture x86_64
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
